ygData.subject: Mystic Alliance on Rodcet
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all: Quick agreement to add to all. The Alliance on Rodcet has been (in the short time since I started up there) extremely active. I d like to ask about
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all:

Quick agreement to add to all. The Alliance on Rodcet has been (in the short
time since I started up there) extremely active. I'd like to ask about
things like the event David was talking about, though. Do these things
happen spontaneously, or are they planned out a few days in advance & notice
given, so folks have a chance to prep?

But seriously, Rodcet rocks! Kerik & Genesius helped me with a 'starter kit'
(Some plat, some armor, nice weapon), and I was able to team up with another
player (Snapdragyn) who had also just restarted, and we helped each other
level up some (although he's probably shot past me to 6 or 7 by now, haven't
you, Snap?<G>)

Gates

Thundyr, Wood Elf Druid of the 5th season


----- Original Message -----
From: "David Lari" <kerik@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 30, 2000 8:59 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] My Intro


> I'd really like to encourage people who only have low level characters to
> come on over to the Rodcet Nife server. The event last night was probably
> the most fun I've ever had playing EQ. We had nine guild members on at the
> same time all fighting in South Ro. Prizes and cash were handed out, too.
We
> had a level range from 5 up to 44. By the end of the event, 3 or 4 people
> had leveled too.
>
> Since coming over to Rodcet and joining the guild, they have given me lots
> of neat items and spotted me much needed cash. We'll be happy to help out
> anyone else who wants to join us.
>
> David
> Kerik, Wood Elf Druid, level 16
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Joseph J. Normandin <josephn@...>
> To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>

We

> madmen
> > (lower lvl) and pumas (REALLY low) it was really fun :) If your
> interested
> > in joining the Mystic Alliance, just give a tell in-game to Fentus,
> > Genesius, Damarr, Taren, Kerik, or Jaleth!
> >
> > -joe
> > Fentus Fayspark
> > Rodcet Nife
